<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2852</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Book Treasure Hunts</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Buch-Schatz-Jagden</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chasses À Trésor de Livre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Caças Do Tesouro Do Livro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Tesoro Del Libro Cerca</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κυνήγια θησαυρών βιβλίων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cazas Del Tesoro Del Libro</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A collection of treasure hunt activities related to specific English text books, but can be adapted to different books</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">books</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reading skills</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">treasure-hunts.</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Ansammlung Schatzjagdaktivitäten stand auf 
spezifischen englischen Textbüchern in Verbindung, aber kann 
unterschiedlichen Büchern angepaßt werden</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une collection d'activités de chasse à trésor a
associé aux manuels anglais spécifiques, mais peut être adaptée à
différents livres</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma coleção de atividades da caça do tesouro 
relacionou-se aos livros de texto ingleses específicos, mas pode ser 
adaptada aos livros diferentes</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una collezione di tesoro cerca le 
attività relative ai manuali inglesi specifici, ma può essere 
adattata ai libri differenti</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια συλλογή των δραστηριοτήτων κυνηγιού θησαυρών 
αφορούσε τα συγκεκριμένα αγγλικά βιβλία κειμένων, αλλά μπορεί 
να προσαρμοστεί στα διαφορετικά βιβλία</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una colección de actividades de la caza del 
tesoro se relacionó con los libros de texto ingleses específicos, 
pero se puede adaptar a diversos libros</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bücher</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lesefähigkeiten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schatz-jagt.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">livres</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">qualifications de lecture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">trésor-chasse.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">livros</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">habilidades da leitura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">tesouro-caça.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">libri</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">abilità della lettura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">treasure-cercare.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βιβλία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">δεξιότητες ανάγνωσης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">θησαυρός-κυνήγια.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">libros</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">habilidades de la lectura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">tesoro-busca.</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
